label: subject
definition: A person who participates in a clinical study.

label: unique subject identifier
definition: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product. This must be a unique number, and could be a compound identifier formed by concatenating STUDYID-SITEID-SUBJID.

label: study site identifier
definition: Unique identifier for a site within a study.

label: age
definition: Age expressed in AGEU. May be derived from RFSTDTC and BRTHDTC,  but BRTHDTC may not be available in all cases (due to subject privacy concerns).

label: sex
definition: Sex of the subject. Need to fill in with description from IG.

label: race
definition: Race of the subject. Sponsors should refer to "Collection of Race and Ethnicity Data in Clinical Trials" (FDA, October, 2016) for guidance regarding the collection of race (https://www.fda.gov/downloads/regulatoryinformation/guidances/ucm126396.pdf). See Assumption below regarding RACE.
